name: UpdateListMemberTags
description:
Add or remove tags from a Mailchimp list member.

Use this tool to manage tags for a specific member in a Mailchimp list. It allows adding new tags or removing existing ones. If a non-existent tag is added and marked as 'active', it will be created automatically.

parameters.name: list_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the Mailchimp list to update tags for a member.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

parameters.name: subscriber_email_hash
parameters.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address.

value_schema.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address.

parameters.name: tags_update_request
parameters.description: JSON object containing tags and their status to be added or removed from a list member. Also includes optional synchronization control with 'is_syncing'.

status.description: The status for the tag on the member, pass in active to add a tag or inactive to remove it.

tags.description: A list of tags assigned to the list member.

is_syncing.description: When is_syncing is true, automations based on the tags in the request will not fire

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the list.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

parameters.name: subscriber_hash
parameters.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address.

value_schema.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address.

status.description: The status for the tag on the member, pass in active to add a tag or inactive to remove it.

tags.description: A list of tags assigned to the list member.

is_syncing.description: When is_syncing is true, automations based on the tags in the request will not fire

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
